Label: Polar Electric Field Instrument, Key Parameters  - F. Mozer (UC Berkeley)

VariableDescription.Name: ESPIN
VariableDescription.Header:
#              ************************************
#              *****    GLOBAL ATTRIBUTES    ******
#              ************************************
#
#     PROJECT                         ISTP>International Solar-Terrestrial Physics
#     DISCIPLINE                      Space Physics>Magnetospheric Science
#     SOURCE_NAME                     POLAR>Polar Plasma Laboratory
#     DATA_TYPE                       K0>Key Parameter
#     DESCRIPTOR                      EFI>Electric Field Instrument
#     DATA_VERSION                    4.1
#     TITLE                           POLAR EFI Key Parameters
#     TEXT                            Reference: DATA FORMAT CONTROL DOCUMENT (DFCD) BETWEEN THE
#                                     INTERNATIONAL SOLAR-TERRESTRIAL PHYSICS (ISTP) PROGRAM
#                                     INFORMATION PROCESSING DIVISION (IPD) GROUND DATA PROCESSING
#                                     SYSTEM AND THE ISTP MISSION INVESTIGATORS SEPTEMBER 1993 Pages 3-57 through                            
#                                      3-60.                                                                                                 
#                                     GGS Instrument papers (DRAFT)December 1992 pages B.2.1 thru B.2.14 inclusive.
#                                     The Polar Electric Field Instrument KPS will record data from two sets of Langmuir                     
#                                      probes.                                                                                               
#                                     The first set V12, are 130m apart, the second set V34, are 100m apart.
#     MODS                            Avoid B algorithm was added to the ground spinfits calculations in version 4.0.
#                                     Version 4.1: Update of Berkeley Modules.
#     ADID_REF                        NSSD0181
#     DISCLAIMER                      KP software may be updated periodically
#     COMMENT                         EFI KPGS uses ground spinfitscalculations with avoid B starting from version                           
#                                      4.0.                                                                                                  
#     LOGICAL_FILE_ID                 PO_K0_EFI_20000729_V01
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE                  PO_K0_EFI
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE_DESCRIPTION      Polar Electric Field Instrument, Key Parameters
#     PI_NAME                         F. Mozer
#     PI_AFFILIATION                  UC Berkeley
#     MISSION_GROUP                   Polar
#                                     !___Magnetospheric Data
#     INSTRUMENT_TYPE                 Electric Fields (space)
#     NSSDC_ID                        spms-00583
#     ALT_LOGICAL_SOURCE              Polar_EFI_Key-Parameters-K0_1min_cdf
#     CDFMAJOR                        ROW_MAJOR
#
#              ************************************
#              ****  RECORD VARYING VARIABLES  ****
#              ************************************
#
#  1. Time relative to midnight January 1, 0 AD, Scalar
#  2. E-Field spin plane, Scalar
#
#  
# Key Parameter and Survey data (labels K0,K1,K2) are preliminary browse data.
# Generated by CDAWeb on: Fri Dec  2 17:15:33 2016
VariableDescription.VariableInfo:
#  2. E-Field spin plane, Scalar
#
EPOCH                   E-FIELD_(P-P)
dd-mm-yyyy hh:mm:ss.ms           mV/m
15-03-1996 00:00:02.878  -1.00000E+31
